About ExamZen

ExamZen was inspired by the challenges faced by small organizations in conducting online exams. As a passionate software developer and educator, I, Orngu Oluwaseyi Emmanuel, created ExamZen to address these issues. This project is part of my Portfolio Project for Holberton School, developed over a short timeline to showcase innovative solutions in the edutech space.
